column3: Latest;Phnom Penh:------ at about 1 pm on 9 November 2018
column4: a suspect snatched a mobile phone from a Korean man on Street 187
column6: Phnom Penh.------The suspects were riding two or three motorbikes to carry the robbery of a Korean man who crossed the road and tried to escape.------One suspect riding a Honda XR Number Plate “Phnom Penh 1FS-3148” was caught and taken in by police.------https://www.postnews.com.kh/local/385696
